rules_text:
Moxie [i](You may have this enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter. If you don't, get {E}{E}.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, Voltaic Eradicator deals 2 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text:
[i]“Your directive is simple. Wipe out the beasts of the Wealds, or be disassembled. Got it?”
—Lady Silver of Spindlegarde[/i]
